subject: Welcome To Superme Court of Ca
body:
Welcome To Superme Court of Canada
74 woolwich St. Guelph ON N1H 3T9 Canada
Ontario SuperiorCourt of Justice
Attn beneficiary
THIS IS YOUR FINALLY NOTICE LAST YEAR I REPEAT THIS IS YOUR FINALLY NOTICE
THIS IS A GOOD NEWS ABOUT YOUR FUNDS HERE IN THIS OFFICE, YOUR
IMMEDIATE ATTENTION IS HIGHLY REQUIRED AND IF YOU FAIL YOUR FUND WILL
BE CANCELED FINALLY TODAY
Iam Sending you this mail in regards to your fund inheritance payment
with US$12,000,000,000,00 Twelve Billion United state Dollars in ATM
MASTER CARD at the custody of the Royal Bank of Canada(RBC)
WE ARE HAVING OUR NEW YEAR BONUS AND YOU ARE LUCKY TO BE AMONG TODAY OK.
You are required to buy only ($25,usd) Steem wallet or iTunes card.
The ONLY charge you will ever pay before your package will leave to
your address you will never pay a dime again as agreed and signed down
here in Court of Canada that you will never pay any other money apart
from the ($25.Usd) SEND THE FEE ONLY TO US TO THIS SUPERMEN COURT AND
WE WILL ORDER YOUR DELIVERY IMMEDIATELY TODAY OK.
Please know that you have from now til tomorrow evening to affect the
required payment and your ATM MASTER CARD . I don't want you to doubt
me on this because after you send the money you will surely share the
testimony to your family and to the church where you worship.
This is your last chance to comply with the instruction or else i will
close your fill which will make it impossible for you to receive your
fund in future. you have only Today and tomorrow to comply or you lose
this great opportunity
Best Regards,
Dr.David I Mckay
The President and CEO.
Royal Bank Of Canada (RBC)

subject: Re: Welcome To Superme Court of Ca
body:
Hello there! Thank you for reaching out to me. I hope you're doing well. I received your email regarding my fund payment with the Royal Bank of Canada. It sounds like good news, but I have a few questions before proceeding. Can you please provide me with more details about this opportunity? What is the purpose of buying the Steem wallet or card? How much is the fee that needs to be paid?

Best wishes,
Kimberly
